#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include<string>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
int test,team,x=0; cin>>test;
   while(test--)
      {cin>>team;int *p=new int[2*team];
      for(int i=0;i<2*team;i++)
      {cin>>p[i];} int max=0; x=0;
              for(int i=0;i<team;i++)
              {
                 x=(p[i]*3)+p[i+team];
                  if(x>max)
                       max=x;
                }
                delete[]p;
                cout<<max<<endl;
                }
                
                              

return 0;
}
